summary: Hieronymus Bosch's artwork depicts the seven deadly sins, which are important concepts in Christianity. These sins are pride, greed, anger (wrath), envy, desire (lust), overeating (gluttony), and laziness (sloth). They are considered very bad habits or actions that people should avoid. The idea of these seven sins started with early Christian writers and has been shown in art and literature for centuries. It has even influenced modern movies and TV shows.
title: Seven deadly sins
